name: The Roots of Creation (GGJ23)
description:
The Roots of Creation -After Halkolog and Timber had fought their battles,

after time, space, the universe, after everything was forged, Halkolog populated his creation with gods.

First he created The Great Divines, who in turn created the planet Teravum and its moon Lumino, and most of the creatures living on the planet.

You are Bugoz, God of The Busy Night, one of The Great Divines, and it is your job to teach all the plant life on the planet how to flourish and thrive!

This game was part of Global Game Jam 2023, held during February 2023.
